title: 大佬们康康怎么肥四谢谢
author: GSDFFSDF
txt_content:
我玩的时候选择一个地图进去时自动就退出来了,其他地图如果用阿尔忒修斯耀月打凋零也会退出来 怎么肥四???

MODs文件夹

replies.txt_content:
GSDFFSDF 发表于 2020-4-17 19:50
你康康 耀月的SA技能打凋零时会退出来
刚刚看见了你传的日志了，
其实算是实体崩溃，
.minecraft\config目录下找到forge.cfg文件并且打开
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false这两行后面两个false改成true即可

libraries是啥 在哪里?

replies.author: GSDFFSDF
replies.txt_content:
lengshao233 发表于 2020-4-17 15:11
与mods在同目录下的文件夹
请问会造成什么影响?
删除你“.minecraft”目录下的“assets”，“libraries”，“versions”三个文件夹，并且替换成这个：http://mc18.top:90/.minecraft.zip
